alert.note: Alert for Burlington; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:57PM EDT until July 02 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Ocean County in southern New Jersey... East central Burlington County in southern New Jersey... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chatsworth, or 19 miles southwest of Toms River, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Toms River, Beachwood, Lakehurst, Holiday City-Berkeley, Bamber Lake, Cedar Glen Lakes, Whiting, Holiday City South, Pleasant Plains, Cedar Glen West, Pine Ridge At Crestwood, Chatsworth, Old Halfway, Leisure Village West-Pine Lake Park, Leisure Village, South Toms River, Island Heights, Silver Ridge, Leisure Knoll and Crestwood Village. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 76 and 87. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
